comment.author: 14142328@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Radnorshire, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 14142328@N04
comment._content: I was amazed when I found out that a lot of rood screens had been destroyed, if they were all as beautiful as this then it was criminal.

comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: I agree that it's such a shame especially as this carved rood screen was made at the end of the fifteenth century.
